About Me

General Info

Hi, I'm Asad. I'm from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I am a professional full-stack web developer with more than 2 years of experience. I have been part of many projects both large and small. I can work with any team or can be an one man army. I can develop any website or web app from scratch to production.

I am a MERN stack web developer with many years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla Javascript, jQuery, SASS, React, Next, Node, Express, Redux, MongoDB, Mongoose, MySQL, SQL, Typescript, GraphQL, REST API, Material UI, etc.

My Skills

HTML5 80%

HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. It is the fifth and final major HTML version that is a World Wide Web Consortium recommendation. I have more than 3 years of experience with HTML5 and can comfortably create any responsive modern website with CSS3 and Javascript.

CSS3 70%

Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in a markup language. CSS3 is a latest standard of css earlier versions(CSS2). I have more than 3 years of experience with CSS3 and can comfortably create any responsive modern website with HTML5 and Javascript.

Javascript 80%

JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat. I have more than 3 years of experience with Javascript and can comfortably create any responsive modern website with HTML5 and CSS3.

SASS 70%

Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world. It is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets. It helps write maintanble CSS specially for large projects and also add supports automatically for the older browsers. I have more than a year experience in SASS and can create CSS styles comfortably with it. Even this website's stylesheets are generated by SASS.

React 70%

React is a free and very popular front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components. It helps to create highly maintanable and reuseable UI components. I have more than 2 years of experience in react and also did a lot of projects with it. Some of the npm packages I use with react regularly is redux and redux-toolkit for state management, react-router for creating front-end routing, axios for API requests, Material UI for building beautiful UI etc.

Node 80%

Node allows developers to write JavaScript code that runs directly in a computer process itself instead of in a browser. Node can, therefore, be used to write server-side applications with access to the operating system, file system, and everything else required to build fully-functional applications. I have more than 2 years experience in node and can create back-end logic for any website and also create CMS for it. To create APIs I use express which is a node.js framework popular with developers to create APIs. Some common npm packages I use regularly is express, bcrypt, jsonwebtoken, lodash, joi, mongoose, etc.

Express 80%

Express.js, or simply Express, is a back end web application framework for Node.js. It is designed for building web applications and APIs. It has been called the de facto standard server framework for Node.js.I have more than 2 years of experience with express to create APIs and back-end logic for websites along with Node.js.

Next 60%

Next is a free and open source framework based on React. Offering Server-Side Rendering, it can be easily combined with Prismic to deliver fast websites and a great developer experience.Prismic is a headless CMS backend for your websites & apps and hugely used with Next.js apps as its backend. Next is also very good for SEO. I have more than 1 year of experience in creating application with Next.js. I have also experience with prismic too.

My Work History

2021 - Present
Freelance Full-stack Web Developer,
Upwork.inc
I have been working as a freelance full-stack developer at Upwork since 2021. I have worked with many clients on various projects. These projects needed a variety of skills like Node, Express, Next, MongoDB, Javascript, HTML, CSS , SVG etc. I have worked in large projects for several months as well as small projects. Some noteable projects are a Balloon Structure design tool using javascript and SVG for an Italian client and a Crypto-currency exchange platform using Next, Node, Express and MongoDB etc.
